text: I condemn first of all this incident in
this brutal action but I am feeling a
shame and talking about this innocent
people are killed in this action I have
very deep sim filled with all the
victims innocent victims even I would
like to say no religion of the world
alone to do this shameful brutal action
not a DA was I should say God not a DA
got quite emotional at times during our
interview at one stage when I asked him
what message he had for the families of
those who were killed in the attack he
started crying and said that he
considered those people who were killed
his relatives his brothers and he
couldn't understand what could bring his
nephew to commit such horrific violence
I also asked him what the reaction had
been firm from not it does family in
London and he said that they were as you
might expect still in a state of deep
deep shock
